lines.text:
[comes out with a shotgun in hand and is startled to see Digital Man messing with his satellite dish]
What the hell are you doing?!

[identifies Billy as a civilian and goes to "civilian mode"]
I must use this uplink to transmit launch code data, with your assistance. Your connection will be temporarily cut off for this process. Thank you. Have a nice day.

[puzzled]
Huh? I ain't assisting you with nothing, ya' crazy bastard, now get ya' damn hands off my satellite dish.
I must transmit launch codes. I will use force to complete my mission. Please, withdraw your weapon.
Withdraw? I say "kiss my ass, you son of a bitch"!
[fires a shot at Digital Man, which bounces off of his armor]
